aircraft.value: Skyguard MK-7 - AC-8338-685 at Forward Operating Base-1

defect_observed.value: Filter bypass indicator activation. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Actuator System component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 05/06/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 06/06/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 06/06/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 09/06/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 11/06/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Actuator System component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
